description: Families are hell. That's a given. There's nobody closer and that special relationship translates into a special ability to wreak havoc when things turn sour. And things have very definitely turned sour for the Shamanov family. Four generations live in the same crowded farmhouse on the remote steppes. Four generations chafing at a lack of opportunity and their meager existence. Four generations of people who, as often as not, barely want to be in one another's presence.
synopsis: A Russian mobster returns to his ancestral home for a family reunion after years of living in the criminal underworld. Unbeknownst to him, his ruthless enemies follow close behind.
title: Dom - a Russian Family
